The claim made by Rick Allen on his Twit: S. Rep. John Barrow does not want to audit the Federal Reserve.
The response from Barrow: s spokesman, Richard Carbo, calling Allen's claim a "big lie" in an email.
The statement from Dan McLagan: a spokesman for Allen, accusing Barrow of trying to be on both sides of the issue of auditing the Federal Reserve.
The evidence provided by McLagan: citing Barrow's vote against a motion to recommit a conference report with instructions related to the regulation of Wall Street, which was seen as supporting Allen's claim.
